roleset.name: make a memorial to
roleset.note: MEMORIALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'memorialize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from memorialize.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: maker of memorial, memorial itself, or agent

example.name: the one example
example.text: Some lawyers and scholars see the social scientists' vision of the American jury system as a far cry from [the ideal]-1 presented in civics texts and memorialized [*]-1 on the movie screen.
